However, precisely because of this reason he felt that they

In addition to the woman, Zhu Changchun, a feature that is "timid" when I was younger around doing business received a lot of bullying have eaten a lot of loss, so then he learned how the sycophant, how to curry favor with others, his life doing things increasingly more smooth and no one will offend.It also makes his business grew and grew.
However, precisely because of this reason he felt that they had not a man, he knows that in the eyes of others, however he is an adept sycophant to curry favor with others businessmen nothing!He felt that they have no self-esteem not lift their heads, never in front of others, although he had great wealth, but money to earn more and more to his feeling changed more intense, especially in front of the rich than their own than respectable.
The only woman he can find that returning to the "self-esteem in a woman he can find the kind of conquest of the pleasure of others.
He lives and living an only son, named Zhu Wenbing, heavy, this only son of his six wives room only the first wife gave birth to such a son, his natural look is heavier than his own life.
His life is of course also look very seriously, he spend 80000 ounces of silver annually to hire personal protection.He also thanks the ecstatic Jianmen learned Xianshu, and learn well, of course, the money did not spend less, light honor each year the division gate money a full 2 as much as 100,000.He still a secret disciple, every month he would spirit Yunshan to learn ten days spell, rain in 15 years the same.And recruited by the elders praised as the best one of the anonymous disciple secondary.He thinks that in the home within a few hundred miles of the Sin City in addition to the owners and elders of the the Strato Yamagami Jianmen several lobby, almost no opponents.
Made him proud of is his "Treasure House" Tucked away in a two-edged "Tigers Xunyang Sword", but a rare two-edged Dwelling jewels.The characteristics of the sword is a sword scabbard is just like the mountains of one hundred Tiger Qi Xiao, loud thunder, and some repair for low simply listening to this scabbard sword sound is already a mental disorder.

Li Chengjie shocked, do not know this old monk when came into his own behind. The old monk eyes closed, hands clasped together, looked at it Li Chengjie. Li Chengjie know this old monk can not be no reason at all to sit behind their own, mostly for their own. Li Chengjie hands holding the 'top five Ecstasy banner' left took two steps, looked at the old monk, the old monk still and closed his eyes, Li Chengjie move without ignores. Li Chengjie carefully to the left to go five or six times, looked back, the old monk is still sitting there, without saying does not move, Li Chengjie heart of a hi Yunzugongli sprang to feet more than Li Chengjie just happy, then feel frosty in front of him, but also an old monk hands clasped together, standing in the Road is blocking his way. Li Chengjie looked around and found the four directions of East and West, respectively, an old monk, on his own to take the encirclement of the way, step by step, slowly moving closer to their own. Li Chengjie Anjiao not good, from the four old monk who distributed to the momentum of view, certainly not the people's opponents, not to mention four old monk, an old monk enough to own by the. Li Chengjie think that the pressure of the body is heavier and heavier, and know not to allow the four old monk close to their own, otherwise with them the momentum that comes out of his injury. The Licheng Jie broke asked: "four is exactly where monks forced to close on the next?" Four old monk silent no sound comes out of the momentum firmly Li Chengjie surrounded. Li Chengjie body seems lost in a quagmire of them, really uncomfortable, covered with blood boiling, Li Chengjie quickly transported from the skill to resist, even the words have been unable to speak. Moment of Kung Fu, Li Chengjie red as blood, appeared to be gas explosion and died. Located in the East that the old monk read: "Amitabha ......" Li Chengjie feeling the pressure of the body around suddenly a light can not help but quickly catch his two coarse. In the Orient that the old monk eyes opened, and the two cleaners injection, mouth, shouted: "evil creature, do not hurry to put down the 'the Wudu Ecstasy banner', without a fight ......"
